Shardlow Contest 0 Test Piece Contest

The Call of Youth
Shardlow, Derbyshire
Prizes - 1st £10, 2nd £5, 3rd £3. March contest - 1st(£1) Nottingham Silver, 2nd (10s.) Shirland and Higham. Hymn tune 1st Nottingham Silver, 2nd Shirland and Higham. Contest restricted to 8 bands.
Jan. 13, 2014, 2:10 p.m. Jan. 13, 2014, 2:21 p.m.
